name: Burst
description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: ArcCorp
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Civilian
With the Burst quantum drive, ArcCorp has taken their popular Rush model and through streamlined re-engineering, managed to improve upon it.
description_cn:
物品类型：量子驱动器
制造商：弧光集团(ArcCorp)
尺寸：1
等级：B
类别：民用
弧光集团的"爆发"量子驱动器是在他们最受欢迎的驱动器型号的基础上通过简化设计，进行改进后的版本.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-十字军(Crusader)-耶拉(Yela)-六角湾(Grim HEX)-翻斗车库
